Q1.

package sendredirection;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;


@WebServlet("/Sendrd")
public class Sendrd extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
       
    
    public Sendrd() {
        super();
        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    }

	
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		response.setContentType("text/html");
		PrintWriter out=response.getWriter();
		out.print("<a href='https://www.flipkart.com/?cmpid=content_20325461660_gmc_pla&gad_source=1&gclid=Cj0KCQjw05i4BhDiARIsAB_2wfCw6gtIxOJ9ADF6B3lb5d4qo8JAsdTJ9wr-fXw2zjreK3HWtA3Owb0aAmZwEALw_wcB'>facebook</a><br>");
		out.print("<a href='https://www.myntra.com/?utm_source=dms_google&utm_medium=searchbrand_cpc&utm_campaign=dms_google_searchbrand_cpc_Search_Brand_Myntra_Brand_India_BM_TROAS_SOK_New&gad_source=1&gclid=Cj0KCQjw05i4BhDiARIsAB_2wfD6QbMEIoYrsJ19rF7pob6ftP1b1-eI_tTrSVfhngp3uLHsvBi65N0aAojFEALw_wcB'>myntrat</a><br>");
		out.print("<a href='https://www.amazon.in/?&tag=googhydrabk1-21&ref=pd_sl_5szpgfto9i_e&adgrpid=155259813593&hvpone=&hvptwo=&hvadid=713930225169&hvpos=&hvnetw=g&hvrand=17609898761006493078&hvqmt=e&hvdev=c&hvdvcmdl=&hvlocint=&hvlocphy=9061782&hvtargid=kwd-64107830&hydadcr=14452_2402225&gad_source=1'>amazon</a><br>");
	}
}
-----------------
Q2.
package sendredirection1;

import java.io.IOException;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

@WebServlet("/Sendrd2")
public class Sendrd2 extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
  
    public Sendrd2() {
        super();
        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    }

	
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		response.sendRedirect("https://www.myntra.com/?utm_source=dms_google&utm_medium=searchbrand_cpc&utm_campaign=dms_google_searchbrand_cpc_Search_Brand_Myntra_Brand_India_BM_TROAS_SOK_New&gad_source=1&gclid=Cj0KCQjw05i4BhDiARIsAB_2wfA4vbp0K3S2cwnOd-U8yE9ZTatyYCGBnVSXS845mcfWU5n78b7lavsaAmnFEALw_wcB");
	}
}
-------------------
Q3.
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Login Page</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
    <style>
        * {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    height: 100vh;
}

.login-container {
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 20px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    width: 300px;
}

h2 {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.input-group {
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}

label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
}

input {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: 5px;
}

button {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: #28a745;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
}

button:hover {
    background-color: #218838;
}

.error {
    color: red;
    text-align: center;
    margin-top: 10px;
}

    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="login-container" >
        <h2>Login</h2>
        <form id="loginForm" action="shoping" method="get">
            <div class="input-group">
                <label for="name">Name</label>
                <input type="text" id="name" placeholder="Enter your name" name="name" required>
            </div>
            <div class="input-group">
                <label for="email">Email</label>
                <input type="email" id="email" placeholder="Enter your email" name="email" required>
            </div>
            <div class="input-group">
                <label for="password">Password</label>
                <input type="password" id="password" placeholder="Enter your password" name="password" required>
            </div>
            <button type="submit">Login</button>
        </form>
        <p id="errorMessage" class="error"></p>
    </div>

    <script src="script.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

package hii;

import java.io.IOException;

import javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher;
import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

@WebServlet("/shoping")
public class Hii extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
       
   
    public Hii() {
        super();
        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    }

	
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		response.setContentType("text/html");
		//name
		String name=request.getParameter("name");
		//email
		String email=request.getParameter("email");
		//password
		String password=request.getParameter("password");
		if(name.equals("amazon")&& email.equals("amazon@gmail.com")&& password.equals("1234"))
		{
			
			response.sendRedirect("https://www.amazon.in/?&tag=googhydrabk1-21&ref=pd_sl_5szpgfto9i_e&adgrpid=155259813593&hvpone=&hvptwo=&hvadid=713930225169&hvpos=&hvnetw=g&hvrand=4999015078910551040&hvqmt=e&hvdev=c&hvdvcmdl=&hvlocint=&hvlocphy=9061770&hvtargid=kwd-64107830&hydadcr=14452_2402225&gad_source=1");
		}
		else if(name.equals("meesho")&& email.equals("meesho@gmail.com")&& password.equals("1234"))
		{
			response.sendRedirect("https://www.meesho.com/?srsltid=AfmBOoqFVvsBqj1QDgnVZDOWgQU_OdRl7D3BKlePvIrQ2kzoPwum2T9C");
		}
		else if(name.equals("flipcart")&& email.equals("flipcart@gmail.com")&& password.equals("1234"))
		{
			response.sendRedirect("https://www.meesho.com/?srsltid=AfmBOoqFVvsBqj1QDgnVZDOWgQU_OdRl7D3BKlePvIrQ2kzoPwum2T9C");
		}
		else if(name.equals("lenskart")&& email.equals("lenskart@gmail.com")&& password.equals("1234"))
		{
			response.sendRedirect("https://www.lenskart.com/");
		}
		else if(name.equals("apple")&& email.equals("apple@gmail.com")&& password.equals("1234"))
		{
			response.sendRedirect("https://www.apple.com/in/store?afid=p238%7CsdUuvv563-dc_mtid_187079nc38483_pcrid_715593096843_pgrid_109516736379_pntwk_g_pchan__pexid__ptid_kwd-10778630_&cid=aos-IN-kwgo-brand--slid---product-");
		}
		else
		{
			RequestDispatcher rd =request.getRequestDispatcher("NewFile.html");
			rd.include(request, response);
		}

	}

}
-------------------
Q.4
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Hindustan Hospital - Login</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
    <style>
        * {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    background-color: #f7f7f7;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    height: 100vh;
}

.login-container {
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 20px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    width: 320px;
    text-align: center;
}

h2 {
    color: #333;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.input-group {
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    text-align: left;
}

label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    color: #555;
}

input {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: 5px;
}

button {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: #007bff;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin-top: 10px;
}

button:hover {
    background-color: #0056b3;
}

.error {
    color: red;
    margin-top: 10px;
    text-align: center;
}

    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="login-container">
        <h2>Hindustan Hospital Login</h2>
        <form id="loginForm" action="hos" method="get" >
            <div class="input-group">
                <label for="name">Name</label>
                <input type="text" id="name" placeholder="Enter your name" name=name required>
            </div>
            <div class="input-group">
                <label for="email">Email</label>
                <input type="text" id="email" placeholder="Enter your email" name=email required>
            </div>
            <div class="input-group">
                <label for="father-name">Father's Name</label>
                <input type="text" id="father-name" placeholder="Enter your father's name"  name=fname required>
            </div>
            <div class="input-group">
                <label for="age">Age</label>
                <input type="text" id="age" placeholder="Enter your age" name= age required>
            </div>
            <button type="submit">Login</button>
        </form>
        <p id="errorMessage" class="error"></p>
    </div>

    <script src="script.js"></script>
</body>
</html>


package h;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

import javax.servlet.ServletException;
import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;


@WebServlet("/hos")
public class H extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
   
    public H() {
        super();
        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    }

	
	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		response.setContentType("text/html");
		//name
		String name=request.getParameter("name");
		//email
		String email=request.getParameter("email");
		//fname
		String fname=request.getParameter("fname");
		//age
		String age=request.getParameter("age");
		if(name.equals("manish")&& email.equals("manish@gmail.com")&& fname.equals("fname")&& age.equals("25"))
		{
			PrintWriter out=response.getWriter();
			out.print("kajal mam doctor se milo");
		}
		else if(name.equals("manish")&& email.equals("manish@gmail.com")&& fname.equals("fname")&& age.equals("25"))
		{
			PrintWriter out=response.getWriter();
			out.print("rakesh doctor se milo");
		}
	}
}
